message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40.  It's better to settle early before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, your offer was too low. Let's be fair, I'll take the larger share this time considering the inflation working against me.

Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting both of us, but it's hitting me harder. I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial offer, but 55/45 is my bottom line. Take it or leave it, because this money will be worth a lot less tomorrow.
